name: Naughty List
description:
A game made for the 2018 Christmas Jam.
https://itch.io/jam/christmas-jam-2018

Theme: You're on the naughty list

Made with Love2d, Lua, Logic Pro X, and PyxelEdit

Source available at https://github.com/bintay/christmas-jam-2018

Audio and libraries:

Classic

Made by rxi
https://github.com/rxi/classic

Cargo
MIT License
Made by Bjorn Swenson (bjornbytes)
https://github.com/bjornbytes/cargo

HUMP

Made by Matthias Richter (vrld)
https://github.com/vrld/hump

Windfield

Made by SSYGEN (adnzzzzzZ)
https://github.com/adnzzzzZ/windfield

Under an Ending Sun
By Andre William Owen (krackatoa)
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/krackatoa/
http://www.krackatoa.com/
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/krackatoa/under_an_ending_sun/

Christmas Town
By John Walters (TRG Banks)
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/TRG_Banks/
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/TRG_Banks/TRG_Banks_Christmas_Album/Christmas_...
